title: Ultra-uniform Perovskite Crystals Formed in the Presence of Tetrabutylammonium bistriflimide Afford Efficient and Stable Perovskite Solar Cells
content:

Jaekeun Lim, Alwani Imanah Rafieh, Naoyuki Shibayama, Jianxing Xia, Jean-Nicolas Nicolas Audinot, Tom Wirtz, Sachin Kinge, Stefan W Glunz, Yong Ding, Bin Ding, Hobeom Kim, Michael Saliba, Zhaofu Fei, Paul Joseph Dyson, Mohammad Khaja Nazeeruddin, Hiroyuki Kanda
Compositional engineering of organic-inorganic metal halide perovskite allows for improved optoelectrical properties, however, phase segregation occurs during crystal nucleation and limits perovskite solar cell device performance. Herein, we show that...
